description: Main React component for a Todo application frontend, handling theme toggling, CRUD operations for todos, and UI structure.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main functional component for the Todo app, managing state and rendering the UI.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Switches theme between light and dark modes.

methods.name: handleAddTodo
methods.description: Handles adding a new Todo item by calling createTodo and updating state.

methods.name: handleEditTodo
methods.description: Initiates editing mode for a specific Todo item.

methods.name: handleSaveEdit
methods.description: Saves the edited text for a Todo item by calling updateTodo and updating state.

methods.name: handleCancelEdit
methods.description: Cancels editing mode and resets related state.

methods.name: handleDeleteTodo
methods.description: Deletes a Todo item via API and updates local state.

methods.name: handleToggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles completion status of a Todo and updates state.
